import React from "react" import { Button } from 'reactstrap' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import TrailSqDefault from '../images/trail-image-square-default.jpg' const TrailList = props => { //trails needs to be defined const { trails } = props return (
{trails.length > 0 && trails.map((trail, index) => { return (
{trail.imgSmallMed === "" && } {trail.imgSmallMed.length > 0 && }

{trail.name}

{trail.location}

{typeof trail.length === "number" &&

{trail.length} mi long

}

{trail.summary}

) })}
) } export default TrailList
